titleStmt.title: An Impartial account of the word "mystery" as it is taken in the Holy Scripture

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through.
This work also appears as part of: The faith of one god. London, 1691, found at reel 344:13 as Wing B2876, and at reel 1615:5 as Wing F258B.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
